name: Platypus Big Zip EVO Drink Tube Kit
categories: Big Zip EVO Drink Tube Kit
description: If your dog used the tube on your Big Zip EVO reservoir as its new chew-toy, get this replacement drink tube kit to get back on the trail without being thirsty.Specific tube lengths for each of the Big Zip EVO Reservoir sizes.Includes a drink tube with quick-disconnect fitting, Big Zip EVO shut-off valve, lapel attachment and a HyFLO™ bite valve.
